expertise.name: Laravel
expertise.content: I learnt Laravel (and other relevant tech like PHP and MySQL) as the backend framework at Stampede, and can comfortably use it for small-scale projects, or prototypes.

expertise.name: Docker
expertise.content: Thanks to a PHP version conflict, I was introduced to Docker. In particular, I learnt to use Docker Compose for multi-container setups, and always prefer to use it for production.

expertise.name: Python
expertise.content: I like using Python for quick scripts and high-level nature (not worrying about segfaults and all that low-level crap).
